title: Plus or Minus
description:
You are given three integers
a
,
b
, and
c
such that exactly one of these two equations is true:
input_specification:
The first line contains a single integer
t
(
1≤t≤162
) — the number of test cases.
The description of each test case consists of three integers
a
,
b
,
c
(
1≤a,b≤9
,
−8≤c≤18
). The additional constraint on the input: it will be generated so that exactly one of the two equations will be true.
output_specification: For each test case, output either + or - on a new line, representing the correct equation.
